name: dead asleep
description:
content warnings: while this game does not describe or depict death, it is about ghosts, and as such deals with death as a theme. it also discusses heaven and hell, the afterlife as consequence for how you lived, and depicts anxiety and guilt. several scenes in this game may cause eye strain! i am working on a version of the game that is black-and-white and higher contrast and will link to it here when it is done.

controls: use the right arrow key or "d" to play this game.

made using bitsy for the sleepy jam.

i made four different versions of this game because i could not settle on one. if you'd like to play another version of the game, click here. :)
